name: Urban Tourist Bus Driving 2018
description:
Enjoy Bus Driving and Transport Public !!


TIPS:
- Follow traffic rules during bus driving, in case you will earn more money.
- Dn’t break traffic signals otherwise you will pay fine of 50$ at every each signal.
- Dn’t let the bus petrol be finished, fill the petrol first.
- The faster you complete the mission, more money you will earn.
- Unlock multiple new buses for unlimited fun.


Game Play Modes:

- Career
- Racing
- Free Trial


Game Play Controls:

- Tilt
- Buttons
- Steering


Features of taxi driver 2018:

- Plenty of bus selections
- HD graphics
- Challenging levels
- 3D camera views
- Smooth control of top bus simulator.
